title: 1999 Valley Fab 8-Station Lettuce Machine Harvester with Double Conveyor Arms and 4-Chain Deck for Cartons
item_description:
1999 Valley Fab 8-Station Lettuce Machine Harvester with Double Conveyor Arms and 4-Chain Deck for Cartons

NOTE: The sale of this harvester is subject to the Seller's confirmation.

  • Make: Valley Fabrication

  • Number of tires: 4
  • Open width: 42’3”
  • Conveyor length: 173”
  • Height: 125”
  • Deck length: 246”
  • Closed length: 28’
  • Hours: 16652
  • Last photo in the gallery is a representative photo to show what this item will look like when it is ready for transport.
